summary.span: 表示实现内存中缓存的类型。

span.span: Represents the type that implements an in-memory cache.
This type is thread safe.

span.span: Note It is not required for configuration information to exist for every name.

span.span: If a matching configuration entry exists, the configuration information is used to configure the instance.

span.span: If a matching configuration entry does not exist, the name can be accessed through the property, because the specified name is associated with the instance.

span.span: A collection of name/value pairs of configuration information to use for configuring the cache.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当初始化类时，它检查是否有可能已被重写通过使用可选的配置条目`config`构造函数中的参数。When the class is initialized, it checks for configuration entries that might have been overridden by using the optional `config` parameter in the constructor. 可以将传递中的以下参数`config`参数。You can pass the following parameters in the `config` parameter. 可以作为整数传递的所有值。All values can be passed as integers. - - - 调用此构造函数时，应用程序配置文件的第一次检索配置设置。When this constructor is invoked, configuration settings are first retrieved from application configuration files. 如果应用程序配置文件中不存在任何配置项，仅设置中提供`config`应用。If no configuration entries exist in the application configuration file, only the settings provided in `config` are applied. 如果在应用程序配置的配置项存在，并且还传入信息`config`中的信息`config`重写从配置文件中读取的信息。If the configuration entries in the application configuration exist, and if information is also passed in `config`, the information in the `config` overrides the information that is read from the configuration file. 分配给缓存实例的名称值使用两种方式：The name value that is assigned to a cache instance is used in two ways: - 若要帮助你跟踪多个缓存实例时存在多个实例。To help you keep track of multiple cache instances when more than one instance exists. - 若要引用的配置中设置文件时实例已初始化。To reference settings in the configuration file when the instance is initialized. > [!NOTE] > 没有任何机制来强制实施缓存实例的唯一名称。There is no mechanism to enforce unique names for cache instances. 因此，很可能有多个具有相同名称的缓存实例。Therefore, it is possible to have multiple cache instances with the same name. > [!CAUTION] > 不要创建除非必需，否则实例。Do not create instances unless it is required. 如果在客户端和 Web 应用程序中创建缓存实例应在应用程序生命周期的早期创建实例。If you create cache instances in client and Web applications, the instances should be created early in the application life cycle. 必须创建仅将应用程序中使用，并将对缓存实例的引用存储在变量中，可以全局访问的缓存实例数。You must create only the number of cache instances that will be used in your application, and store references to the cache instances in variables that can be accessed globally. 例如，在 ASP.NET 应用程序，可以存储应用程序状态中的引用。For example, in ASP.NET applications, you can store the references in application state. 如果在应用程序中创建只有单个缓存实例，使用默认缓存，并获取对从它的引用属性时需要访问缓存。If you create only a single cache instance in your application, use the default cache and get a reference to it from the property when you need to access the cache.

summary.span: 将缓存项作为 实例插入到缓存中，并添加有关如何逐出该项的详细信息。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache as a instance, and adds details about how the entry should be evicted.

returns.span: 如果插入成功，则为 true；如果缓存中已存在具有与项相同的键，则为 false。

span.span: true if insertion succeeded, or false if there is an already an entry in the cache that has the same key as item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 和 方法重载不支持 属性。The and method overloads do not support the property. 因此，若要设置缓存项的 属性，请改用 方法重载。Therefore, to set the property for a cache entry, use the method overloads instead.

summary.span: 将某个缓存项插入缓存中。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载用于插入缓存项插入缓存。The method overloads are used to insert a cache entry into the cache. 如果不存在具有匹配键的缓存项，这些方法将插入新条目。If a cache entry with a matching key does not exist, these methods insert a new entry. 如果已存在具有匹配键的缓存项，它们将返回现有条目。If a cache entry with a matching key already exists, they return the existing entry.

span.span: Adds a cache entry into the cache using the specified instance and details about how to evict the entry.

returns.span: 如果存在具有相同键的缓存项，则为现有的缓存项；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `item`参数提供键和值的方法使用。The `item` parameter supplies the key and the value that is used by the method. 如果缓存了具有相同键的键的缓存项`item`参数，该方法将返回现有项作为实例。If the cache has a cache entry with the same key as the key of the `item` parameter, the method returns the existing entry as a instance. 如果没有现有的缓存项，方法将创建一个通过使用密钥和提供的值的新`item`参数，并使用指定的逐出详细信息`policy`。If there is no existing cache entry, the method creates a new one by using the key and value supplied by the `item` parameter, and with the eviction details specified by `policy`. > [!WARNING] > 和 方法重载不支持 属性。The and method overloads do not support the property. 因此，若要设置缓存项的 属性，请改用 方法重载。Therefore, to set the property for a cache entry, use the method overloads instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public long CacheMemoryLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 CacheMemoryLimit
Public ReadOnly Property CacheMemoryLimit As Long
public: property long CacheMemoryLimit { long get(); };
member this.CacheMemoryLimit : int64

summary.span: 获取计算机上缓存可使用的内存量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the amount of memory on the computer, in bytes, that can be used by the cache.
The amount of memory in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果缓存的当前实例超出了内存设置上限属性，缓存实现中移除缓存项。If the current instance of the cache exceeds the limit on memory set by the property, the cache implementation removes cache entries. 在应用程序中的每个缓存实例可以使用由指定的内存量属性。Each cache instance in the application can use the amount of memory that is specified by the property. 有关设置可以在应用程序配置文件中指定属性。The settings for the property can be specified in the application configuration file. 或者，您可以将它们传递构造函数中时初始化类。Alternatively, they can be passed in the constructor when the class is initialized. 有关如何配置此属性的详细信息，请参阅[ <namedCaches>元素 （缓存设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure this property, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md). 有关如何设置此详细信息值何时正在初始化类，请参阅方法。For more information about how to set this value when the class is being initialized, see the method. 不会立即强制一个新项添加到每个时间实例。 does not instantly enforce each time a new item is added to a instance. 逐出项从其内部试探法逐步执行并从垃圾回收器将考虑帐户信息 (请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)) 和其他因素，例如当前缓存大小和总体系统内存不足的情况。The internal heuristics which evicts extra items from the does it gradually and takes into account information from the garbage collector (see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)) and other factors such as current cache size and overall system memory pressure. 因此即使尝试将保持在已配置的缓存大小可能暂时超过限制，通过以非常高的速率添加缓存项。Therefore even though the tries to keep the cache size within the configured it is possible to temporarily exceed the limit by adding cache items at a very high rate.

returns.span: 用于监视缓存中的项的更改监视器。

span.span: A change monitor that monitors entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建实例。The method creates a instance. 此专用的更改监视器用于监视中指定的缓存条目`keys`集合并更改项时触发事件。This specialized change monitor is used to monitor the cache entries that are specified in the `keys` collection and to trigger events when the entries change. 被监视的项被视为已更改的任何原因如下：A monitored entry is considered to have changed for any of the following reasons: - 在调用时不存在该键方法。The key does not exist at the time of the call to the method. 在这种情况下，生成实例将立即设置为已更改的状态。In that case, the resulting instance is immediately set to a changed state. 这意味着当代码随后绑定更改通知回调，立即触发回调。This means that when code subsequently binds a change-notification callback, the callback is triggered immediately. - 关联的缓存项已从缓存中删除。The associated cache entry was removed from the cache. 这可能会删除该条目显式，如果过期，或者恢复内存中逐出This can occur if the entry is explicitly removed, if it expires, or if it is evicted to recover memory

exception.span: 不是 。

exception.span: 为 。

summary.span: 获取对默认 实例的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the default instance.
The default instance of the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性始终返回默认缓存实例的引用。This property always returns a reference to the default cache instance. 对于典型的应用程序方案，只有一个实例是必需的。For typical application scenarios, only one instance of is required. 因为构造函数不创建默认缓存实例，必须使用配置来显式设置内存和轮询的默认缓存实例的值。Because the default cache instance is not created by the constructor, you must use configuration to explicitly set the memory and polling values for the default cache instance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <memoryCache>元素 （缓存设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information, see [<memoryCache> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个实例绑定到事件。Each instance is bound to the event. 但是，应用程序域在关闭期间，如果基于内存的缓存未显式释放，缓存实例将自动调用方法。However, during application-domain shutdown, if a memory-based cache has not been explicitly disposed, the cache instance will automatically call the method. 已释放的缓存实例关闭的情况下使用以下步骤：The disposed cache instance is shut down using the following steps: 1. 缓存的状态设置为指示缓存已被释放。The state of the cache is set to indicate that the cache is disposed. 任何尝试调用公共缓存方法更改状态的缓存，如添加、 删除或检索缓存项的方法，可能会导致意外的行为。Any attempt to call public caching methods that change the state of the cache, such as methods that add, remove, or retrieve cache entries, might cause unexpected behavior. 例如，如果您调用方法释放缓存后，将不执行任何操作发生错误。For example, if you call the method after the cache is disposed, a no-op error occurs. 如果你尝试从缓存中检索项方法将始终返回`null`。If you attempt to retrieve items from the cache, the method will always return `null`. 2. 从当前的缓存实例不会再引发性能计数器信息。Performance counter information is no longer raised from the current cache instance. 3. 将释放对保存当前的缓存实例的缓存对象的所有引用。All references to cached objects held by the current cache instance are released. 4. 任何当前正在监视缓存中的项的实例会收到通知。Any instances that are currently monitoring entries in the cache are notified. 5. 这些监视器提供更改通知的回调对象被称为。Callback objects that provide notification of changes for those monitors are called. 6. 任何调用注册的缓存中的项的实例。Any instances that are registered with entries in the cache are called. 传递给回调的删除原因是。The removal reason that is passed to the callbacks is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的单个实例可以使用的总物理计算机内存的百分比类。The property returns the percentage of total physical computer memory that can be used by a single instance of the class. 如果缓存实例超过指定的限制，会删除缓存项。If the cache instance exceeds the specified limit, cache entries are removed. 有关设置可以在应用程序配置文件中指定属性。The settings for the property can be specified in the application configuration file. 或者，可以由调用方传递它们时初始化类。Alternatively, they can be passed by a caller when the class is initialized. 有关如何配置此属性的详细信息，请参阅[ <namedCaches>元素 （缓存设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md)。For more information about how to configure this property, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings.md). 详细了解如何配置属性时正在初始化类，请参阅方法。For more information about how to configure the property when the class is being initialized, see the method.

summary.span: 使用 实例将某个缓存项插入缓存中，以便为该缓存项提供键和值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像其他方法重载方法始终将缓存值放在缓存中，而不考虑的条目是否已存在具有相同的键。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether an entry already exists that has the same key. 如果在缓存中，指定的项不存在，则插入新的缓存项。If the specified entry does not exist in the cache, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果指定的项已存在，其值被更新。If the specified entry already exists, its value is updated.

summary.span: 使用键和值将某个缓存项插入缓存中，并指定基于时间的过期详细信息。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache by using a key and a value and specifies time-based expiration details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像其他方法重载方法始终缓存将值放在缓存中，而不考虑是否已存在具有相同键的条目。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether an entry already exists with the same key. 如果指定的项不存在，则插入新的缓存项。If the specified entry does not exist, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果存在指定的项，它会更新。If the specified entry exists, it is updated. `absoluteExpiration`参数指示何时应从缓存中移除该条目。The `absoluteExpiration` parameter indicates when the entry should be removed from the cache. 移除条目会触发任何关联的更改监视器。Removing an entry triggers any associated change monitors. 如果已移除的项已与相关联对象或对象中包含传递给回调的删除的原因属性。If the removed item was associated with a object or object, the reason for removal that is passed to the callbacks is contained in the property.

span.span: Provides support for iteration over a generic collection.

span.span: The enumerator object that provides access to the entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 可以使用它时，才实例转换为接口。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface. 此方法可用于循环访问泛型集合的缓存项。You can use this method to iterate through a generic collection of cache entries.

MemberSignature.Value: public long Trim (int percent);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 Trim(int32 percent) cil managed
Public Function Trim (percent As Integer) As Long
public: long Trim(int percent);
member this.Trim : int -> int64

param.name: percent
param.span: 要移除的缓存项总数的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of total cache entries to remove.

summary.span: 从缓存对象中移除指定百分比的缓存项。

span.span: Removes a specified percentage of cache entries from the cache object.
The number of entries removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中首先删除已超出绝对或可调过期的条目。The property first removes entries that have exceeded either an absolute or sliding expiration. 为删除的项将传递一个删除的原因注册任何回调。Any callbacks that are registered for items that are removed will be passed a removed reason of . 如果删除已过期的条目是不足以达到指定的剪裁百分比，将从根据最近最少使用 (LRU) 算法，直到达到请求的剪裁百分比缓存中删除其他条目。If removing expired entries is insufficient to reach the specified trim percentage, additional entries will be removed from the cache based on a least-recently used (LRU) algorithm until the requested trim percentage is reached. 将传递的项中删除这种方式注册任何回调将删除原因。Any callbacks that are registered for items that are removed this way will be passed a remove reason of .
